name: Spectre
title: Mercurial
lore: A phantom born from a broken goddess, Spectre haunts all who witness her ghostly form.

spectralDagger.name: Spectral Dagger
spectralDagger.description: Throws a dagger that damages enemies and leaves a shadow path. Spectre gains phased movement on the path.

desolate.name: Desolate
desolate.description: Deals bonus damage to enemies who are alone, without nearby allies.

dispersion.name: Dispersion
dispersion.description: Reflects a portion of damage taken back to nearby enemies.

haunt.name: Haunt
haunt.description: Creates a spectral illusion to attack each enemy hero. Can teleport to any illusion.
